message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $8500. Would it be possible for us to negotiate closer to that range?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8500. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $8750. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still looking to stay within $8500 if possible. Would it be feasible for us to negotiate closer to that price point?
I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise, but I need to get closer to my original offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8600. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I'm still aiming to keep my investment within $8500. Would it be possible for us to reach an agreement closer to that price?
I understand you're sticking to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8700. This is my final offer. What do you think?

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. I'm still aiming to keep my investment within $8500. Would it be possible for us to reach an agreement closer to that price?

I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8750. This is my last offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
